text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.title: Mob Variants Config
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.z: Convert Zombies to Forgottens under selected Y level:
Zombies have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Convert Spiders to Black Spiders under selected Y level:
Spiders have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
Convert Skeletons to Undead Warriors under selected Y level:
Skeletons have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.c: Convert creepers to cave creepers under selected Y level:
Creepers have a chance to convert into stronger variant when they spawn below this Y level
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.w: Chance to convert Wither Skeleton to Executioner
For example, when set to 10, Wither Skeleton will have 10% chance to convert to Executioner after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.g: Chance to convert Ghast to Nightmare
For example, when set to 10, Ghast will have 10% chance to convert to Nightmare after spawning
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.z: Chance to convert Zombie to Explorer in jungle, swamp or lush cave:
For example, when set to 90, Zombie will have 90% chance to convert to Explorer after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
text.autoconfig.frycmobvariants.option.s: Chance to convert Spider to Tropical Spider in jungle:
For example, when set to 70, Spider will have 70% chance to convert to Tropical Spider after spawning on one of mentioned biomes
